title: Apple cake with orange zest
ingredients: ['120g butter', '150g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons orange juice', '2 teaspoons minced orange zest', '125g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', 'a pinch salt', '2 apples - peeled, cored and sliced', 'icing sugar']
